What is git?

How does git work?

Git Flow

  • Create a branch
  • Make your changes
  • Create a pull request
  • Review
  • Merge

Pull requests

  • Pull request description
  • Commits in PR
  • Label the PR
  • Comments
  • PR referenced in an issue
  • Suggested changes

Pull requests

Issues

Collaboration and GitHub

GitHub encourages collaboration with:

  • Issues
  • Pull requests
  • Feedback and review

Markdown

Plain text markdown language

  • format text
  • write notes
  • write slides
  • build webpages
  • GitHub documentation

Traceablility

  • Each commit is traceable and visable
  • Roll back to previous commits

Projects

  • Kanban style project management
  • Automatically move cards with issues and PR
